snippet: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton arrived in Dhaka to urge feuding political parties to work together in one of the world’s most impoverished nations.
abstract: Sec of State Hillary Rodham Clinton arrives in Dhaka, Bangladesh, to urge the country's feuding political parties to work together and end their most recent bout of discord for the good of their impoverished nation; she calls for a government investigation into the whereabouts of opposition leader Elias Ali.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton arrived in Dhaka to urge feuding political parties to work together in one of the world’s most impoverished nations.

headline.seo: Clinton Urges Bangladeshis to End Strife
headline.main: Clinton Urges Bangladeshis to End Strife
headline.print_headline: Clinton Urges Bangladeshis to End Strife
